comment.author: 58446043@N04
comment._content: Looks like the Camarasaurus skeleton that is currently laying on its side in the Dinosaur Gallery. The specimen came from Dinosaur National Monument and was obtained from the Carnegie Museum. The man is working on the sacrum.
